observation.reason: The website has unusually low prices and claims of free on various items such as batteries wires and connectors. The website also contains multiple products that are not commonly found on typical e-commerce websites which is a characteristic of a scam website. The contact information and privacy policy are not easily accessible and the product information listed has not been updated.
